title: Awesome machines compilation   International harvester tractor commercial

subtasks: Lift legs up and down repeatedly
Mimic walking motion without actual movement

tasks.task: if she’s milking a cow, sometimes you have to lift the legs to position the udder. But if the relevancy is rejected and replaced with tasks based on possible actions, then the central theme seems to be movement and causing movement through leg actions and walking imitations, with the main goal being to get the subject to go. Hence, the structure with MAINTASK as Repeatedly urge followed by subtasks of lifting legs/marching motions.
